text: Pleuropetalum darwinii is a species of plant in the family Amaranthaceae. It is native to the Galápagos Islands.Tye, A. 2000. Pleuropetalum darwinii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.3. Downloaded on 20 April 2015. ==References== Category:Amaranthaceae Category:Flora of the Galápagos Islands Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pleuropetalum darwinii
